question: Which is the country of origin of the famous band group "Bembeya Jazz National"?
explanation: Guinea is the country of origin of the famous band group "Bembeya Jazz National". Bembeya Jazz National is a Guinean jazz group that gained fame in the 1960s for their Afropop rhythms. They are considered one of the most significant bands in Guinean music. Many of their recordings are based on traditional folk music in the country and have been fused with jazz and Afropop style.
